inclusion.criterion: No medication with influence on the pituitary-thyroid axis
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: No childbirth or pregnancy within the last year
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Going to undergo hemithyroidectomy for nontoxic goiter at the department of otorhinolaryngology at Slagelse Hospital, Denmark.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Malignant goiter, diagnosed by histological examination of the resected tissue
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has Hashimoto's thyroiditis and is taking Levothyroxine. Her symptoms improved significantly after treatment.
